Trade/Device Name(s): EZ Scan Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): EZ Scan Plus Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the EZ Scan Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose testing in capillary whole blood using an electrochemical biosensor.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm using the EZ Scan Plus system for home or clinical use as an aid in monitoring diabetes control.
